title: I personally wouldn't recommend it at all.
review: This movie has some nice animation, but the overall plot and the main characters ruined it for me. From the very beginning the main character was a drag. He was constantly complaining and saying that he was different and acting selfishly. I tried to like guy, but he only thought about himself until the very end of the movie. The other characters were pretty one-dimensional. There was also some sexual remarks such as Z saying that the princess would no longer be a part of his 'erotic fantasies.' Little things like that made the movie feel dirty. The plot was predictable within the first 5 minutes. You can give it a try and form your own opinion, but I personally don't recommend this movie.
